description: Mind Body Connection in Germantown, TN. Germantown Chiropractic Clinic is your local Chiropractor in Germantown serving all of your needs. Call us today at 901-757-9000 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Mindfulness programs and practices frequently describe a process of locating your "center."
